projects.name: Computer assisted anaesthetic dosage according to pharmacokinetic algorithms
projects.body: This modified approach ensures an optimal use of anaesthetic agents taking into account the individual needs of each patient.

projects.name: Simulation of endotracheal intubation
projects.body: These days, the intubation simulators are lacking interactivity. The aim of this study is to elaborate a modified simulator which will be as close as possible to real conditions.
